Calvin Klein Men's Cotton brief is excellent in fabric, fits as expected. Only
the original box of Calvin Klein was not intact and in one of the underwear
the tag was missing. In one of the piece the centre stitch was slightly
damaged, so far i have never seen in any of Calvin Klein product. May its a
manufacturing defect.  
  
However I cannot compromise the quality and the material of the product. I can
rate "Excellent" for the product.

Yes the product is all good and comfortable. But the make is Thailand and
there is a lot of Chinese type language written inside. I'm not saying it's a
replica but there were no CK tags inside, instead there was a tag with
"Chinese or something" written all over it.

Decent product, sizing not per international quality.

Excellent product with almost half of the price. Genuine CK and brand new.
very much satisfied.

language tags. Overpriced for Chinese imitation.

Have been using Ck for over 5 yrs and havent seen such poor quality from them.

Be advised customers , if the product is made in Thailand or Vietnam it's fake
